title: Health query implementation
description: Implement `app/graphql/queries/health.py` with Query class containing health field. The resolver should execute `SELECT 1` query using session from context to verify database connectivity, then return 'ok' string. Use @strawberry.type and @strawberry.field decorators.
acceptance_criteria:
- health query returns 'ok' when DB is connected
- Query executes SELECT 1 to verify connectivity
- Uses session from info.context
- Proper error handling if DB unreachable
- Returns str type
